targets.rawSql: SELECT CASE sensor_name WHEN 'dry_bulb_f' THEN 'Dry Bulb (°C) - Front' WHEN 'dry_bulb_b' THEN 'Dry Bulb (°C) - Back' WHEN 'wet_bulb_f' THEN 'Wet Bulb (°C) - Front' WHEN 'wet_bulb_b' THEN 'Wet Bulb (°C) - Back' WHEN 'rh_f' THEN 'RH (%) - Front' WHEN 'rh_b' THEN 'RH (%) - Back' WHEN 'vpd_f' THEN 'VPD (kPa) - Front' WHEN 'vpd_b' THEN 'VPD (kPa) - Back' WHEN 'co2_f' THEN 'CO2 (ppm) - Front' WHEN 'co2_b' THEN 'CO2 (ppm) - Back' WHEN 'pressure_f' THEN 'Pressure (hPa) - Front' WHEN 'pressure_b' THEN 'Pressure (hPa) - Back' WHEN 'secondary_temp_f' THEN 'Secondary Temp (°C) - Front' WHEN 'secondary_temp_b' THEN 'Secondary Temp (°C) - Back' WHEN 'secondary_rh_f' THEN 'Secondary RH (%) - Front' WHEN 'secondary_rh_b' THEN 'Secondary RH (%) - Back' WHEN 'water_level_f' THEN 'Water Level (mm) - Front' WHEN 'water_level_b' THEN 'Water Level (mm) - Back' ELSE sensor_name END AS \"Sensor\", MIN(value) AS \"Min\", MAX(value) AS \"Max\", AVG(value) AS \"Average\", STDDEV(value) AS \"Std Dev\" FROM measurement_with_metadata WHERE time >= $__timeFrom() AND time <= $__timeTo() GROUP BY sensor_name ORDER BY CASE WHEN sensor_name LIKE 'dry_bulb%' THEN 1 WHEN sensor_name LIKE 'wet_bulb%' THEN 2 WHEN sensor_name LIKE 'rh%' AND sensor_name NOT LIKE 'secondary_rh%' THEN 3 WHEN sensor_name LIKE 'vpd%' THEN 4 WHEN sensor_name LIKE 'co2%' THEN 5 WHEN sensor_name LIKE 'pressure%' THEN 6 WHEN sensor_name LIKE 'secondary_temp%' THEN 7 WHEN sensor_name LIKE 'secondary_rh%' THEN 8 WHEN sensor_name LIKE 'water_level%' THEN 9 ELSE 10 END, sensor_name
